name: Holey Space Adventure
description:
**NOTE**
We HIGHLY recommend you to play the downloaded version of the game, since the Web version cannot load our beautiful Visual Effects.

This project is brought to you by 3 young students who are interested in Game Development. This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 (Theme: Holes).

Check out the other guys' itch pages:
https://itch.io/profile/equalsnull
https://itch.io/profile/ilreverde20

Game Description:
You guide various space shuttles to other planets, while avoiding asteroids on your way. To do so, you will use the our newest technology: Dark Matter manipulation! Dark matter can be used to make Black or White Holes, which help the space shuttles to find their way through the asteroids.

While Black Holes attract everything nearby, White Holes do the exact opposite. Use these attributes to guide the space shuttle through space!

Controls
You do everything using the Mouse and the Left Mouse Button
Place/Select Black Holes: Mouse 0
Fire Space Shuttle: Hold and Drag Mouse 0, release to fire

We know that the fourth (and currently last) level is very difficult, but trust us: it is possible. I hope you enjoy!

Oh and try pressing the left mouse button during the credits ;)

Thank you for playing!
